Description: A series of fragments from the funerary papyrus of a man named Paawy with vignettes and text in hieratic from the Book of the Dead.
Excavator/field collector: Field Collection by: William John Bankes
Curator's comments: Mosher, Malcom Jr. 2016. The Book of the Dead, Saite through Ptolemaic periods : a study of traditions evident in versions of texts and vignettes (SPBD Studies), vol. I (BD Spells 1-15) and II (BD Spells 16, 18-30), Charleston.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (57530) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/57530)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: displaced fragments, loss Black ink Red ink Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: magic tape Binding: self adhesive tape Object Priority: A Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: A
